abstract: AT&T argued that it should be allowed to withdraw the T-Mobile USA deal from consideration by the F.C.C. without permission from the agency.
snippet: AT&T argued that it should be allowed to withdraw the T-Mobile USA deal from consideration by the F.C.C. without permission from the agency.
lead_paragraph: Nothing is easy when it comes to AT&T‘s proposed $39 billion takeover of T-Mobile USA — apparently not even when it comes to withdrawing the deal from the government approval process.

headline.main: AT&T Spars With F.C.C. Over Withdrawal of T-Mobile Deal

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
